task_descriptions: Search for a @Cost-1 hotel that is not in the @Location-1 part of town and note its name.
Find a @Cost-1 hotel with a rating higher than @AverageRating-1 and note its name and the part of town it is in.
Search for @Name-1 near the @Location-1 part of town and note its rating. Then try to find another hotel in the same part of town, but with higher rating.
completion_questions: Did the AI Assistant find you a suitable hotel?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Help the user find a specific hotel.
